title.value: PQ/CMC Drug Product Component Function Category Terminology

publisher.value: Food and Drug Administration (FDA) and the National Cancer Institute's Thesaurus (NCIt)

description.value: Terminology used to qualify the information pertaining to drug product component function categories in the framework of the Pharmaceutical Quality/Chemistry, Manufacturing and Controls documents.
